title: Grateful Dead Live at Winterland Arena on 1978-10-22
lineage: Nakamichi CR3A w/ Dolby > Audigy 4 Pro @ 24/44.1 > Editing with NERO > Tracked With CD Wave > Dithered to 16 bit with Audacity > Flac (level 8).
source: 2 Sony ecm-280 microphones (shoulder high) > Teac PC-10 w/ Dolby > TDK SA-C90 tape. Our location was on the floor under the mirrored ball about 20-25 feet from the stage dead center.
